summary: This bill, the "Improving Access to Workers’ Compensation for Injured Federal Workers Act", amends Chapter 81 of Title 5 of the United States Code to expand workers' compensation coverage for injured federal workers. Specifically, it includes services provided by physician assistants and nurse practitioners within the scope of their practice, as defined by state law. The Secretary of Labor is directed to finalize rules to implement these changes within six months of the Act's enactment.
